00072 typedef struct {
00073     DerivedMesh dm;
00074 
00075     /* these point to data in the DerivedMesh custom data layers,
00076      * they are only here for efficiency and convenience **/
00077     MVert *mvert;
00078     MEdge *medge;
00079     MFace *mface;
00080     MLoop *mloop;
00081     MPoly *mpoly;
00082 
00083     /* Cached */
00084     struct PBVH *pbvh;
00085     int pbvh_draw;
00086 
00087     /* Mesh connectivity */
00088     MeshElemMap *pmap;
00089     int *pmap_mem;
00090 } CDDerivedMesh;

00104 {

00106      * to help debug tessfaces issues since BMESH merge. */
00107 #if 0
00108     if (dm->numTessFaceData == 0 && dm->numPolyData != 0) {
00109         printf("%s: has no faces!, call DM_ensure_tessface() if you need them\n");
00110     }
00111 #endif

00173 static void cdDM_getMinMax(DerivedMesh *dm, float min_r[3], float max_r[3])
00174 {
00175     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00176     int i;
00177 
00178     if (dm->numVertData) {
00179         for (i=0; i<dm->numVertData; i++) {
00180             DO_MINMAX(cddm->mvert[i].co, min_r, max_r);
00181         }
00182     }
00183     else {
00184         zero_v3(min_r);
00185         zero_v3(max_r);
00186     }
00187 }

00199     int i;

00202         copy_v3_v3(cos_r[i], mv->co);

00211 static const MeshElemMap *cdDM_getPolyMap(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00212 {
00213     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00214 
00215     if (!cddm->pmap && ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00216         Mesh *me= ob->data;
00217 
00218         create_vert_poly_map(&cddm->pmap, &cddm->pmap_mem,
00219                              me->mpoly, me->mloop,
00220                              me->totvert, me->totpoly, me->totloop);
00221     }
00222 
00223     return cddm->pmap;
00224 }
00225 
00226 static int can_pbvh_draw(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00227 {
00228     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00229     Mesh *me= ob->data;
00230     int deformed= 0;
00231 
00232     /* active modifiers means extra deformation, which can't be handled correct
00233      * on birth of PBVH and sculpt "layer" levels, so use PBVH only for internal brush
00234      * stuff and show final DerivedMesh so user would see actual object shape */
00235     deformed|= ob->sculpt->modifiers_active;
00236 
00237     /* as in case with modifiers, we can't synchronize deformation made against
00238      * PBVH and non-locked keyblock, so also use PBVH only for brushes and
00239      * final DM to give final result to user */
00240     deformed|= ob->sculpt->kb && (ob->shapeflag&OB_SHAPE_LOCK) == 0;
00241 
00242     if (deformed)
00243         return 0;
00244 
00245     return cddm->mvert == me->mvert || ob->sculpt->kb;
00246 }
00247 
00248 static struct PBVH *cdDM_getPBVH(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm)
00249 {
00250     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00251 
00252     if (!ob) {
00253         cddm->pbvh= NULL;
00254         return NULL;
00255     }
00256 
00257     if (!ob->sculpt)
00258         return NULL;
00259     if (ob->sculpt->pbvh) {
00260         cddm->pbvh= ob->sculpt->pbvh;
00261         cddm->pbvh_draw = can_pbvh_draw(ob, dm);
00262     }
00263 
00264     /* always build pbvh from original mesh, and only use it for drawing if
00265      * this derivedmesh is just original mesh. it's the multires subsurf dm
00266      * that this is actually for, to support a pbvh on a modified mesh */
00267     if (!cddm->pbvh && ob->type == OB_MESH) {
00268         SculptSession *ss= ob->sculpt;
00269         Mesh *me= ob->data;
00270         cddm->pbvh = BLI_pbvh_new();
00271         cddm->pbvh_draw = can_pbvh_draw(ob, dm);
00272 
00273         BKE_mesh_tessface_ensure(me);
00274         
00275         BLI_pbvh_build_mesh(cddm->pbvh, me->mface, me->mvert,
00276                             me->totface, me->totvert);
00277 
00278         if (ss->modifiers_active && ob->derivedDeform) {
00279             DerivedMesh *deformdm= ob->derivedDeform;
00280             float (*vertCos)[3];
00281             int totvert;
00282 
00283             totvert= deformdm->getNumVerts(deformdm);
00284             vertCos= MEM_callocN(3*totvert*sizeof(float), "cdDM_getPBVH vertCos");
00285             deformdm->getVertCos(deformdm, vertCos);
00286             BLI_pbvh_apply_vertCos(cddm->pbvh, vertCos);
00287             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
00288         }
00289     }
00290 
00291     return cddm->pbvh;
00292 }
00293 
00294 /* update vertex normals so that drawing smooth faces works during sculpt
00295  * TODO: proper fix is to support the pbvh in all drawing modes */
00296 static void cdDM_update_normals_from_pbvh(DerivedMesh *dm)
00297 {
00298     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00299     float (*face_nors)[3];
00300 
00301     if (!cddm->pbvh || !cddm->pbvh_draw || !dm->numTessFaceData)
00302         return;
00303 
00304     face_nors = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL);
00305 
00306     BLI_pbvh_update(cddm->pbvh, PBVH_UpdateNormals, face_nors);
00307 }

00309 static void cdDM_drawVerts(DerivedMesh *dm)
00310 {
00311     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00312     MVert *mv = cddm->mvert;
00313     int i;
00314 
00315     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00316         glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00317         for (i = 0; i < dm->numVertData; i++, mv++)
00318             glVertex3fv(mv->co);
00319         glEnd();
00320     }
00321     else {  /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00322         GPU_vertex_setup(dm);
00323         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00324             if (dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point)
00325                 glDrawArrays(GL_POINTS,0, dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point);
00326             else
00327                 glDrawArrays(GL_POINTS,0, dm->drawObject->tot_loose_point);
00328         }
00329         GPU_buffer_unbind();
00330     }
00331 }
00332 
00333 static void cdDM_drawUVEdges(DerivedMesh *dm)
00334 {
00335     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00336     MFace *mf = cddm->mface;
00337     MTFace *tf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE);
00338     int i;
00339 
00340     if (mf) {
00341         if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00342             glBegin(GL_LINES);
00343             for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, mf++, tf++) {
00344                 if (!(mf->flag&ME_HIDE)) {
00345                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
00346                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[1]);
00347 
00348                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[1]);
00349                     glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
00350 
00351                     if (!mf->v4) {
00352                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
00353                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
00354                     }
00355                     else {
00356                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[2]);
00357                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[3]);
00358 
00359                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[3]);
00360                         glVertex2fv(tf->uv[0]);
00361                     }
00362                 }
00363             }
00364             glEnd();
00365         }
00366         else {
00367             int prevstart = 0;
00368             int prevdraw = 1;
00369             int draw = 1;
00370             int curpos = 0;
00371 
00372             GPU_uvedge_setup(dm);
00373             if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00374                 for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, mf++) {
00375                     if (!(mf->flag&ME_HIDE)) {
00376                         draw = 1;
00377                     } 
00378                     else {
00379                         draw = 0;
00380                     }
00381                     if ( prevdraw != draw ) {
00382                         if ( prevdraw > 0 && (curpos-prevstart) > 0) {
00383                             glDrawArrays(GL_LINES,prevstart,curpos-prevstart);
00384                         }
00385                         prevstart = curpos;
00386                     }
00387                     if ( mf->v4 ) {
00388                         curpos += 8;
00389                     }
00390                     else {
00391                         curpos += 6;
00392                     }
00393                     prevdraw = draw;
00394                 }
00395                 if ( prevdraw > 0 && (curpos-prevstart) > 0 ) {
00396                     glDrawArrays(GL_LINES,prevstart,curpos-prevstart);
00397                 }
00398             }
00399             GPU_buffer_unbind();
00400         }
00401     }
00402 }
00403 
00404 static void cdDM_drawEdges(DerivedMesh *dm, int drawLooseEdges, int drawAllEdges)
00405 {
00406     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00407     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
00408     MEdge *medge = cddm->medge;
00409     int i;
00410     
00411     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00412         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawEdges\n" );
00413         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00414         for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, medge++) {
00415             if ((drawAllEdges || (medge->flag & ME_EDGEDRAW)) &&
00416                 (drawLooseEdges || !(medge->flag & ME_LOOSEEDGE)))
00417             {
00418                 glVertex3fv(mvert[medge->v1].co);
00419                 glVertex3fv(mvert[medge->v2].co);
00420             }
00421         }
00422         glEnd();
00423     }
00424     else {  /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00425         int prevstart = 0;
00426         int prevdraw = 1;
00427         int draw = TRUE;
00428 
00429         GPU_edge_setup(dm);
00430         if (!GPU_buffer_legacy(dm)) {
00431             for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, medge++) {
00432                 if ((drawAllEdges || (medge->flag & ME_EDGEDRAW)) &&
00433                     (drawLooseEdges || !(medge->flag & ME_LOOSEEDGE)))
00434                 {
00435                     draw = TRUE;
00436                 } 
00437                 else {
00438                     draw = FALSE;
00439                 }
00440                 if ( prevdraw != draw ) {
00441                     if ( prevdraw > 0 && (i-prevstart) > 0 ) {
00442                         GPU_buffer_draw_elements(dm->drawObject->edges, GL_LINES, prevstart * 2, (i - prevstart) * 2);
00443                     }
00444                     prevstart = i;
00445                 }
00446                 prevdraw = draw;
00447             }
00448             if ( prevdraw > 0 && (i-prevstart) > 0 ) {
00449                 GPU_buffer_draw_elements(dm->drawObject->edges, GL_LINES, prevstart * 2, (i-prevstart) * 2);
00450             }
00451         }
00452         GPU_buffer_unbind();
00453     }
00454 }
00455 
00456 static void cdDM_drawLooseEdges(DerivedMesh *dm)
00457 {
00458     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00459     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
00460     MEdge *medge = cddm->medge;
00461     int i;
00462 
00463     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00464         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawLooseEdges\n" );
00465         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00466         for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, medge++) {
00467             if (medge->flag&ME_LOOSEEDGE) {
00468                 glVertex3fv(mvert[medge->v1].co);
00469                 glVertex3fv(mvert[medge->v2].co);
00470             }
00471         }
00472         glEnd();
00473     }
00474     else {  /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00475         int prevstart = 0;
00476         int prevdraw = 1;
00477         int draw = 1;
00478 
00479         GPU_edge_setup(dm);
00480         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00481             for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, medge++) {
00482                 if (medge->flag&ME_LOOSEEDGE) {
00483                     draw = 1;
00484                 } 
00485                 else {
00486                     draw = 0;
00487                 }
00488                 if ( prevdraw != draw ) {
00489                     if ( prevdraw > 0 && (i-prevstart) > 0) {
00490                         GPU_buffer_draw_elements(dm->drawObject->edges, GL_LINES, prevstart * 2, (i - prevstart) * 2);
00491                     }
00492                     prevstart = i;
00493                 }
00494                 prevdraw = draw;
00495             }
00496             if ( prevdraw > 0 && (i-prevstart) > 0 ) {
00497                 GPU_buffer_draw_elements(dm->drawObject->edges, GL_LINES, prevstart * 2, (i - prevstart) * 2);
00498             }
00499         }
00500         GPU_buffer_unbind();
00501     }
00502 }

00504 static void cdDM_drawFacesSolid(DerivedMesh *dm,
00505                 float (*partial_redraw_planes)[4],
00506                 int UNUSED(fast), DMSetMaterial setMaterial)
00507 {
00508     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00509     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
00510     MFace *mface = cddm->mface;
00511     float *nors= dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_NORMAL);
00512     int a, glmode = -1, shademodel = -1, matnr = -1, drawCurrentMat = 1;
00513 
00514 #define PASSVERT(index) {                       \
00515     if (shademodel == GL_SMOOTH) {              \
00516         short *no = mvert[index].no;            \
00517         glNormal3sv(no);                        \
00518     }                                           \
00519     glVertex3fv(mvert[index].co);   \
00520 }
00521 
00522     if (cddm->pbvh && cddm->pbvh_draw) {
00523         if (dm->numTessFaceData) {
00524             float (*face_nors)[3] = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL);
00525 
00526             BLI_pbvh_draw(cddm->pbvh, partial_redraw_planes, face_nors, setMaterial);
00527             glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00528         }
00529 
00530         return;
00531     }
00532 
00533     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00534         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawFacesSolid\n" );
00535         glBegin(glmode = GL_QUADS);
00536         for (a = 0; a < dm->numTessFaceData; a++, mface++) {
00537             int new_glmode, new_matnr, new_shademodel;
00538 
00539             new_glmode = mface->v4?GL_QUADS:GL_TRIANGLES;
00540             new_matnr = mface->mat_nr + 1;
00541             new_shademodel = (mface->flag & ME_SMOOTH)?GL_SMOOTH:GL_FLAT;
00542             
00543             if (new_glmode != glmode || new_matnr != matnr || new_shademodel != shademodel) {
00544                 glEnd();
00545 
00546                 drawCurrentMat = setMaterial(matnr = new_matnr, NULL);
00547 
00548                 glShadeModel(shademodel = new_shademodel);
00549                 glBegin(glmode = new_glmode);
00550             } 
00551             
00552             if (drawCurrentMat) {
00553                 if (shademodel == GL_FLAT) {
00554                     if (nors) {
00555                         glNormal3fv(nors);
00556                     }
00557                     else {
00558                         /* TODO make this better (cache facenormals as layer?) */
00559                         float nor[3];
00560                         if (mface->v4) {
00561                             normal_quad_v3( nor,mvert[mface->v1].co, mvert[mface->v2].co, mvert[mface->v3].co, mvert[mface->v4].co);
00562                         }
00563                         else {
00564                             normal_tri_v3( nor,mvert[mface->v1].co, mvert[mface->v2].co, mvert[mface->v3].co);
00565                         }
00566                         glNormal3fv(nor);
00567                     }
00568                 }
00569 
00570                 PASSVERT(mface->v1);
00571                 PASSVERT(mface->v2);
00572                 PASSVERT(mface->v3);
00573                 if (mface->v4) {
00574                     PASSVERT(mface->v4);
00575                 }
00576             }
00577 
00578             if (nors) nors += 3;
00579         }
00580         glEnd();
00581     }
00582     else {  /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00583         GPU_vertex_setup( dm );
00584         GPU_normal_setup( dm );
00585         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00586             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00587             for (a = 0; a < dm->drawObject->totmaterial; a++) {
00588                 if (setMaterial(dm->drawObject->materials[a].mat_nr + 1, NULL)) {
00589                     glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, dm->drawObject->materials[a].start,
00590                                  dm->drawObject->materials[a].totpoint);
00591                 }
00592             }
00593         }
00594         GPU_buffer_unbind( );
00595     }
00596 
00597 #undef PASSVERT
00598     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00599 }
00600 
00601 static void cdDM_drawFacesTex_common(DerivedMesh *dm,
00602                DMSetDrawOptionsTex drawParams,
00603                DMSetDrawOptions drawParamsMapped,
00604                DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00605                void *userData) 
00606 {
00607     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00608     MVert *mv = cddm->mvert;
00609     MFace *mf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MFACE);
00610     MCol *realcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_TEXTURE_MCOL);
00611     float *nors= dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_NORMAL);
00612     MTFace *tf = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MTFACE);
00613     int i, j, orig, *index = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00614     int startFace = 0 /*, lastFlag = 0xdeadbeef */ /* UNUSED */;
00615     MCol *mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
00616     if (!mcol)
00617         mcol = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MCOL);
00618 
00619     cdDM_update_normals_from_pbvh(dm);
00620 
00621     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00622         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawFacesTex_common\n" );
00623         for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, mf++) {
00624             MVert *mvert;
00625             DMDrawOption draw_option;
00626             unsigned char *cp = NULL;
00627 
00628             if (drawParams) {
00629                 draw_option = drawParams(tf? &tf[i]: NULL, (mcol != NULL), mf->mat_nr);
00630             }
00631             else {
00632                 if (index) {
00633                     orig = *index++;
00634                     if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE)     { if (nors) nors += 3; continue; }
00635                     if (drawParamsMapped) draw_option = drawParamsMapped(userData, orig);
00636                     else    { if (nors) nors += 3; continue; }
00637                 }
00638                 else
00639                     if (drawParamsMapped) draw_option = drawParamsMapped(userData, i);
00640                     else    { if (nors) nors += 3; continue; }
00641             }
00642             
00643             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00644                 if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_NO_MCOL && mcol)
00645                     cp= (unsigned char*) &mcol[i*4];
00646 
00647                 if (!(mf->flag&ME_SMOOTH)) {
00648                     if (nors) {
00649                         glNormal3fv(nors);
00650                     }
00651                     else {
00652                         float nor[3];
00653                         if (mf->v4) {
00654                             normal_quad_v3( nor,mv[mf->v1].co, mv[mf->v2].co, mv[mf->v3].co, mv[mf->v4].co);
00655                         }
00656                         else {
00657                             normal_tri_v3( nor,mv[mf->v1].co, mv[mf->v2].co, mv[mf->v3].co);
00658                         }
00659                         glNormal3fv(nor);
00660                     }
00661                 }
00662 
00663                 glBegin(mf->v4?GL_QUADS:GL_TRIANGLES);
00664                 if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf[i].uv[0]);
00665                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
00666                 mvert = &mv[mf->v1];
00667                 if (mf->flag&ME_SMOOTH) glNormal3sv(mvert->no);
00668                 glVertex3fv(mvert->co);
00669                     
00670                 if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf[i].uv[1]);
00671                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
00672                 mvert = &mv[mf->v2];
00673                 if (mf->flag&ME_SMOOTH) glNormal3sv(mvert->no);
00674                 glVertex3fv(mvert->co);
00675 
00676                 if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf[i].uv[2]);
00677                 if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
00678                 mvert = &mv[mf->v3];
00679                 if (mf->flag&ME_SMOOTH) glNormal3sv(mvert->no);
00680                 glVertex3fv(mvert->co);
00681 
00682                 if (mf->v4) {
00683                     if (tf) glTexCoord2fv(tf[i].uv[3]);
00684                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
00685                     mvert = &mv[mf->v4];
00686                     if (mf->flag&ME_SMOOTH) glNormal3sv(mvert->no);
00687                     glVertex3fv(mvert->co);
00688                 }
00689                 glEnd();
00690             }
00691             
00692             if (nors) nors += 3;
00693         }
00694     }
00695     else { /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00696         MCol *col = realcol;
00697         if (!col)
00698             col = mcol;
00699 
00700         GPU_vertex_setup( dm );
00701         GPU_normal_setup( dm );
00702         GPU_uv_setup( dm );
00703         if ( col != NULL ) {
00704 #if 0
00705             if ( realcol && dm->drawObject->colType == CD_TEXTURE_MCOL ) {
00706                 col = 0;
00707             }
00708             else if ( mcol && dm->drawObject->colType == CD_MCOL ) {
00709                 col = 0;
00710             }
00711             
00712             if ( col != 0 )
00713 #endif
00714             {
00715                 unsigned char *colors = MEM_mallocN(dm->getNumTessFaces(dm)*4*3*sizeof(unsigned char), "cdDM_drawFacesTex_common");
00716                 for ( i=0; i < dm->getNumTessFaces(dm); i++ ) {
00717                     for ( j=0; j < 4; j++ ) {
00718                         /* bgr -> rgb is intentional (and stupid), but how its stored internally */
00719                         colors[i*12+j*3] = col[i*4+j].b;
00720                         colors[i*12+j*3+1] = col[i*4+j].g;
00721                         colors[i*12+j*3+2] = col[i*4+j].r;
00722                     }
00723                 }
00724                 GPU_color3_upload(dm,colors);
00725                 MEM_freeN(colors);
00726                 if (realcol)
00727                     dm->drawObject->colType = CD_TEXTURE_MCOL;
00728                 else if (mcol)
00729                     dm->drawObject->colType = CD_MCOL;
00730             }
00731             GPU_color_setup( dm );
00732         }
00733 
00734         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00735             int tottri = dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point/3;
00736             int next_actualFace= dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[0];
00737 
00738             glShadeModel( GL_SMOOTH );
00739             /* lastFlag = 0; */ /* UNUSED */
00740             for (i = 0; i < tottri; i++) {
00741                 int actualFace = next_actualFace;
00742                 DMDrawOption draw_option = DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
00743                 int flush = 0;
00744 
00745                 if (i != tottri-1)
00746                     next_actualFace= dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[i+1];
00747 
00748                 if (drawParams) {
00749                     draw_option = drawParams(tf? &tf[actualFace]: NULL, (mcol != NULL), mf[actualFace].mat_nr);
00750                 }
00751                 else {
00752                     if (index) {
00753                         orig = index[actualFace];
00754                         if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) continue;
00755                         if (drawParamsMapped)
00756                             draw_option = drawParamsMapped(userData, orig);
00757                     }
00758                     else
00759                         if (drawParamsMapped)
00760                             draw_option = drawParamsMapped(userData, actualFace);
00761                 }
00762 
00763                 /* flush buffer if current triangle isn't drawable or it's last triangle */
00764                 flush= (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) || (i == tottri - 1);
00765 
00766                 if (!flush && compareDrawOptions) {
00767                     /* also compare draw options and flush buffer if they're different
00768                      * need for face selection highlight in edit mode */
00769                     flush|= compareDrawOptions(userData, actualFace, next_actualFace) == 0;
00770                 }
00771 
00772                 if (flush) {
00773                     int first= startFace*3;
00774                     /* Add one to the length if we're drawing at the end of the array */
00775                     int count= (i-startFace+(draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP ? 1 : 0))*3;
00776 
00777                     if (count) {
00778                         if (col)
00779                             GPU_color_switch(1);
00780                         else
00781                             GPU_color_switch(0);
00782 
00783                         glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, first, count);
00784                     }
00785 
00786                     startFace = i + 1;
00787                 }
00788             }
00789         }
00790 
00791         GPU_buffer_unbind();
00792         glShadeModel( GL_FLAT );
00793     }
00794 }
00795 
00796 static void cdDM_drawFacesTex(DerivedMesh *dm,
00797                DMSetDrawOptionsTex setDrawOptions,
00798                DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00799                void *userData)
00800 {
00801     cdDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, setDrawOptions, NULL, compareDrawOptions, userData);
00802 }
00803 
00804 static void cdDM_drawMappedFaces(DerivedMesh *dm,
00805             DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00806             DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
00807             DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00808             void *userData, DMDrawFlag flag)
00809 {
00810     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
00811     MVert *mv = cddm->mvert;
00812     MFace *mf = cddm->mface;
00813     MCol *mc;
00814     float *nors= DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_NORMAL);
00815     int useColors = flag & DM_DRAW_USE_COLORS;
00816     int i, orig, *index = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00817 
00818     mc = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_ID_MCOL);
00819     if (!mc)
00820         mc = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
00821     if (!mc)
00822         mc = DM_get_tessface_data_layer(dm, CD_MCOL);
00823 
00824     cdDM_update_normals_from_pbvh(dm);
00825 
00826     /* back-buffer always uses legacy since VBO's would need the
00827      * color array temporarily overwritten for drawing, then reset. */
00828     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) || G.f & G_BACKBUFSEL) {
00829         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawMappedFaces\n" );
00830         for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, mf++) {
00831             int drawSmooth = (flag & DM_DRAW_ALWAYS_SMOOTH) ? 1 : (mf->flag & ME_SMOOTH);
00832             DMDrawOption draw_option= DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
00833 
00834             orig= (index==NULL) ? i : *index++;
00835             
00836             if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE)
00837                 draw_option= setMaterial(mf->mat_nr + 1, NULL);
00838             else if (setDrawOptions != NULL)
00839                 draw_option= setDrawOptions(userData, orig);
00840 
00841             if (draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) {
00842                 unsigned char *cp = NULL;
00843 
00844                 if (useColors && mc)
00845                     cp = (unsigned char *)&mc[i * 4];
00846 
00847                 /* no need to set shading mode to flat because
00848                  *  normals are already used to change shading */
00849                 glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00850                 glBegin(mf->v4?GL_QUADS:GL_TRIANGLES);
00851 
00852                 if (!drawSmooth) {
00853                     if (nors) {
00854                         glNormal3fv(nors);
00855                     }
00856                     else {
00857                         float nor[3];
00858                         if (mf->v4) {
00859                             normal_quad_v3( nor,mv[mf->v1].co, mv[mf->v2].co, mv[mf->v3].co, mv[mf->v4].co);
00860                         }
00861                         else {
00862                             normal_tri_v3( nor,mv[mf->v1].co, mv[mf->v2].co, mv[mf->v3].co);
00863                         }
00864                         glNormal3fv(nor);
00865                     }
00866 
00867                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
00868                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v1].co);
00869                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
00870                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v2].co);
00871                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
00872                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v3].co);
00873                     if (mf->v4) {
00874                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
00875                         glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v4].co);
00876                     }
00877                 }
00878                 else {
00879                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[3], cp[2], cp[1]);
00880                     glNormal3sv(mv[mf->v1].no);
00881                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v1].co);
00882                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[7], cp[6], cp[5]);
00883                     glNormal3sv(mv[mf->v2].no);
00884                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v2].co);
00885                     if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[11], cp[10], cp[9]);
00886                     glNormal3sv(mv[mf->v3].no);
00887                     glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v3].co);
00888                     if (mf->v4) {
00889                         if (cp) glColor3ub(cp[15], cp[14], cp[13]);
00890                         glNormal3sv(mv[mf->v4].no);
00891                         glVertex3fv(mv[mf->v4].co);
00892                     }
00893                 }
00894 
00895                 glEnd();
00896             }
00897             
00898             if (nors) nors += 3;
00899         }
00900     }
00901     else { /* use OpenGL VBOs or Vertex Arrays instead for better, faster rendering */
00902         int prevstart = 0;
00903         GPU_vertex_setup(dm);
00904         GPU_normal_setup(dm);
00905         if ( useColors && mc )
00906             GPU_color_setup(dm);
00907         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
00908             int tottri = dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point/3;
00909             glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00910             
00911             if (tottri == 0) {
00912                 /* avoid buffer problems in following code */
00913             }
00914             if (setDrawOptions == NULL) {
00915                 /* just draw the entire face array */
00916                 glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, (tottri) * 3);
00917             }
00918             else {
00919                 /* we need to check if the next material changes */
00920                 int next_actualFace= dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[0];
00921                 
00922                 for ( i = 0; i < tottri; i++ ) {
00923                     //int actualFace = dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[i];
00924                     int actualFace = next_actualFace;
00925                     MFace *mface= mf + actualFace;
00926                     /*int drawSmooth= (flag & DM_DRAW_ALWAYS_SMOOTH) ? 1 : (mface->flag & ME_SMOOTH);*/ /* UNUSED */
00927                     DMDrawOption draw_option = DM_DRAW_OPTION_NORMAL;
00928                     int flush = 0;
00929 
00930                     if (i != tottri-1)
00931                         next_actualFace= dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[i+1];
00932 
00933                     orig= (index==NULL) ? actualFace : index[actualFace];
00934 
00935                     if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE)
00936                         draw_option= setMaterial(mface->mat_nr + 1, NULL);
00937                     else if (setDrawOptions != NULL)
00938                         draw_option= setDrawOptions(userData, orig);
00939     
00940                     /* Goal is to draw as long of a contiguous triangle
00941                      * array as possible, so draw when we hit either an
00942                      * invisible triangle or at the end of the array */
00943 
00944                     /* flush buffer if current triangle isn't drawable or it's last triangle... */
00945                     flush= (draw_option == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP) || (i == tottri - 1);
00946 
00947                     /* ... or when material setting is dissferent  */
00948                     flush|= mf[actualFace].mat_nr != mf[next_actualFace].mat_nr;
00949 
00950                     if (!flush && compareDrawOptions) {
00951                         flush|= compareDrawOptions(userData, actualFace, next_actualFace) == 0;
00952                     }
00953 
00954                     if (flush) {
00955                         int first= prevstart*3;
00956                         /* Add one to the length if we're drawing at the end of the array */
00957                         int count= (i-prevstart+(draw_option != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP ? 1 : 0))*3;
00958 
00959                         if (count)
00960                             glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, first, count);
00961 
00962                         prevstart = i + 1;
00963                     }
00964                 }
00965             }
00966 
00967             glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00968         }
00969         GPU_buffer_unbind();
00970     }
00971 }
00972 
00973 static void cdDM_drawMappedFacesTex(DerivedMesh *dm,
00974                DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
00975                DMCompareDrawOptions compareDrawOptions,
00976                void *userData)
00977 {
00978     cdDM_drawFacesTex_common(dm, NULL, setDrawOptions, compareDrawOptions, userData);
00979 }
00980 
00981 static void cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(DMVertexAttribs *attribs, MVert *mvert, int a, int index, int vert, int smoothnormal)
00982 {
00983     int b;
00984 
00985     /* orco texture coordinates */
00986     if (attribs->totorco) {
00987         if (attribs->orco.glTexco)
00988             glTexCoord3fv(attribs->orco.array[index]);
00989         else
00990             glVertexAttrib3fvARB(attribs->orco.glIndex, attribs->orco.array[index]);
00991     }
00992 
00993     /* uv texture coordinates */
00994     for (b = 0; b < attribs->tottface; b++) {
00995         MTFace *tf = &attribs->tface[b].array[a];
00996 
00997         if (attribs->tface[b].glTexco)
00998             glTexCoord2fv(tf->uv[vert]);
00999         else
01000             glVertexAttrib2fvARB(attribs->tface[b].glIndex, tf->uv[vert]);
01001     }
01002 
01003     /* vertex colors */
01004     for (b = 0; b < attribs->totmcol; b++) {
01005         MCol *cp = &attribs->mcol[b].array[a*4 + vert];
01006         GLubyte col[4];
01007         col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01008         glVertexAttrib4ubvARB(attribs->mcol[b].glIndex, col);
01009     }
01010 
01011     /* tangent for normal mapping */
01012     if (attribs->tottang) {
01013         float *tang = attribs->tang.array[a*4 + vert];
01014         glVertexAttrib4fvARB(attribs->tang.glIndex, tang);
01015     }
01016 
01017     /* vertex normal */
01018     if (smoothnormal)
01019         glNormal3sv(mvert[index].no);
01020     
01021     /* vertex coordinate */
01022     glVertex3fv(mvert[index].co);
01023 }
01024 
01025 static void cdDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL(DerivedMesh *dm,
01026                DMSetMaterial setMaterial,
01027                DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions,
01028                void *userData)
01029 {
01030     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
01031     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01032     DMVertexAttribs attribs;
01033     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
01034     MFace *mface = cddm->mface;
01035     /* MTFace *tf = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_MTFACE); */ /* UNUSED */
01036     float (*nors)[3] = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_NORMAL);
01037     int a, b, dodraw, matnr, new_matnr;
01038     int orig, *index = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01039 
01040     cdDM_update_normals_from_pbvh(dm);
01041 
01042     matnr = -1;
01043     dodraw = 0;
01044 
01045     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01046 
01047     if ( GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) || setDrawOptions != NULL ) {
01048         DEBUG_VBO( "Using legacy code. cdDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL\n" );
01049         memset(&attribs, 0, sizeof(attribs));
01050 
01051         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01052 
01053         for (a = 0; a < dm->numTessFaceData; a++, mface++) {
01054             const int smoothnormal = (mface->flag & ME_SMOOTH);
01055             new_matnr = mface->mat_nr + 1;
01056 
01057             if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01058                 glEnd();
01059 
01060                 dodraw = setMaterial(matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01061                 if (dodraw)
01062                     DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01063 
01064                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01065             }
01066 
01067             if (!dodraw) {
01068                 continue;
01069             }
01070             else if (setDrawOptions) {
01071                 orig = (index)? index[a]: a;
01072 
01073                 if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) {
01074                     /* since the material is set by setMaterial(), faces with no
01075                      * origin can be assumed to be generated by a modifier */ 
01076                     
01077                     /* continue */
01078                 }
01079                 else if (setDrawOptions(userData, orig) == DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)
01080                     continue;
01081             }
01082 
01083             if (!smoothnormal) {
01084                 if (nors) {
01085                     glNormal3fv(nors[a]);
01086                 }
01087                 else {
01088                     /* TODO ideally a normal layer should always be available */
01089                     float nor[3];
01090                     if (mface->v4) {
01091                         normal_quad_v3( nor,mvert[mface->v1].co, mvert[mface->v2].co, mvert[mface->v3].co, mvert[mface->v4].co);
01092                     }
01093                     else {
01094                         normal_tri_v3( nor,mvert[mface->v1].co, mvert[mface->v2].co, mvert[mface->v3].co);
01095                     }
01096                     glNormal3fv(nor);
01097                 }
01098             }
01099 
01100             cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mface->v1, 0, smoothnormal);
01101             cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mface->v2, 1, smoothnormal);
01102             cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mface->v3, 2, smoothnormal);
01103 
01104             if (mface->v4)
01105                 cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mface->v4, 3, smoothnormal);
01106             else
01107                 cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mface->v3, 2, smoothnormal);
01108         }
01109         glEnd();
01110     }
01111     else {
01112         GPUBuffer *buffer = NULL;
01113         char *varray = NULL;
01114         int numdata = 0, elementsize = 0, offset;
01115         int start = 0, numfaces = 0 /* , prevdraw = 0 */ /* UNUSED */, curface = 0;
01116         int i;
01117 
01118         MFace *mf = mface;
01119         GPUAttrib datatypes[GPU_MAX_ATTRIB]; /* TODO, messing up when switching materials many times - [#21056]*/
01120         memset(&attribs, 0, sizeof(attribs));
01121 
01122         GPU_vertex_setup(dm);
01123         GPU_normal_setup(dm);
01124 
01125         if ( !GPU_buffer_legacy(dm) ) {
01126             for ( i = 0; i < dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point/3; i++ ) {
01127 
01128                 a = dm->drawObject->triangle_to_mface[i];
01129 
01130                 mface = mf + a;
01131                 new_matnr = mface->mat_nr + 1;
01132 
01133                 if (new_matnr != matnr ) {
01134                     numfaces = curface - start;
01135                     if ( numfaces > 0 ) {
01136 
01137                         if ( dodraw ) {
01138 
01139                             if ( numdata != 0 ) {
01140 
01141                                 GPU_buffer_unlock(buffer);
01142 
01143                                 GPU_interleaved_attrib_setup(buffer,datatypes,numdata);
01144                             }
01145 
01146                             glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES,start*3,numfaces*3);
01147 
01148                             if ( numdata != 0 ) {
01149 
01150                                 GPU_buffer_free(buffer);
01151 
01152                                 buffer = NULL;
01153                             }
01154 
01155                         }
01156                     }
01157                     numdata = 0;
01158                     start = curface;
01159                     /* prevdraw = dodraw; */ /* UNUSED */
01160                     dodraw = setMaterial(matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01161                     if (dodraw) {
01162                         DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01163 
01164                         if (attribs.totorco) {
01165                             datatypes[numdata].index = attribs.orco.glIndex;
01166                             datatypes[numdata].size = 3;
01167                             datatypes[numdata].type = GL_FLOAT;
01168                             numdata++;
01169                         }
01170                         for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {
01171                             datatypes[numdata].index = attribs.tface[b].glIndex;
01172                             datatypes[numdata].size = 2;
01173                             datatypes[numdata].type = GL_FLOAT;
01174                             numdata++;
01175                         }   
01176                         for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {
01177                             datatypes[numdata].index = attribs.mcol[b].glIndex;
01178                             datatypes[numdata].size = 4;
01179                             datatypes[numdata].type = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
01180                             numdata++;
01181                         }   
01182                         if (attribs.tottang) {
01183                             datatypes[numdata].index = attribs.tang.glIndex;
01184                             datatypes[numdata].size = 4;
01185                             datatypes[numdata].type = GL_FLOAT;
01186                             numdata++;
01187                         }
01188                         if ( numdata != 0 ) {
01189                             elementsize = GPU_attrib_element_size( datatypes, numdata );
01190                             buffer = GPU_buffer_alloc( elementsize*dm->drawObject->tot_triangle_point);
01191                             if ( buffer == NULL ) {
01192                                 GPU_buffer_unbind();
01193                                 dm->drawObject->legacy = 1;
01194                                 return;
01195                             }
01196                             varray = GPU_buffer_lock_stream(buffer);
01197                             if ( varray == NULL ) {
01198                                 GPU_buffer_unbind();
01199                                 GPU_buffer_free(buffer);
01200                                 dm->drawObject->legacy = 1;
01201                                 return;
01202                             }
01203                         }
01204                         else {
01205                             /* if the buffer was set, don't use it again.
01206                              * prevdraw was assumed true but didnt run so set to false - [#21036] */
01207                             /* prevdraw= 0; */ /* UNUSED */
01208                             buffer= NULL;
01209                         }
01210                     }
01211                 }
01212 
01213                 if (dodraw && numdata != 0 ) {
01214                     offset = 0;
01215                     if (attribs.totorco) {
01216                         copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v1]);
01217                         copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+elementsize],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v2]);
01218                         copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+elementsize*2],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v3]);
01219                         offset += sizeof(float)*3;
01220                     }
01221                     for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {
01222                         MTFace *tf = &attribs.tface[b].array[a];
01223                         copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset],tf->uv[0]);
01224                         copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize],tf->uv[1]);
01225 
01226                         copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2],tf->uv[2]);
01227                         offset += sizeof(float)*2;
01228                     }
01229                     for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {
01230                         MCol *cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 0];
01231                         GLubyte col[4];
01232                         col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01233                         copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset], (char *)col);
01234                         cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 1];
01235                         col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01236                         copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize], (char *)col);
01237                         cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 2];
01238                         col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01239                         copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2], (char *)col);
01240                         offset += sizeof(unsigned char)*4;
01241                     }   
01242                     if (attribs.tottang) {
01243                         float *tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 0];
01244                         copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset], tang);
01245                         tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 1];
01246                         copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize], tang);
01247                         tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 2];
01248                         copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2], tang);
01249                         offset += sizeof(float)*4;
01250                     }
01251                     (void)offset;
01252                 }
01253                 curface++;
01254                 if (mface->v4) {
01255                     if (dodraw && numdata != 0 ) {
01256                         offset = 0;
01257                         if (attribs.totorco) {
01258                             copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v3]);
01259                             copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+elementsize],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v4]);
01260                             copy_v3_v3((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+elementsize*2],(float *)attribs.orco.array[mface->v1]);
01261                             offset += sizeof(float)*3;
01262                         }
01263                         for (b = 0; b < attribs.tottface; b++) {
01264                             MTFace *tf = &attribs.tface[b].array[a];
01265                             copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset],tf->uv[2]);
01266                             copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize],tf->uv[3]);
01267                             copy_v2_v2((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2],tf->uv[0]);
01268                             offset += sizeof(float)*2;
01269                         }
01270                         for (b = 0; b < attribs.totmcol; b++) {
01271                             MCol *cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 2];
01272                             GLubyte col[4];
01273                             col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01274                             copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset], (char *)col);
01275                             cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 3];
01276                             col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01277                             copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize], (char *)col);
01278                             cp = &attribs.mcol[b].array[a*4 + 0];
01279                             col[0]= cp->b; col[1]= cp->g; col[2]= cp->r; col[3]= cp->a;
01280                             copy_v4_v4_char((char *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2], (char *)col);
01281                             offset += sizeof(unsigned char)*4;
01282                         }   
01283                         if (attribs.tottang) {
01284                             float *tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 2];
01285                             copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset], tang);
01286                             tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 3];
01287                             copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize], tang);
01288                             tang = attribs.tang.array[a*4 + 0];
01289                             copy_v4_v4((float *)&varray[elementsize*curface*3+offset+elementsize*2], tang);
01290                             offset += sizeof(float)*4;
01291                         }
01292                         (void)offset;
01293                     }
01294                     curface++;
01295                     i++;
01296                 }
01297             }
01298             numfaces = curface - start;
01299             if ( numfaces > 0 ) {
01300                 if ( dodraw ) {
01301                     if ( numdata != 0 ) {
01302                         GPU_buffer_unlock(buffer);
01303                         GPU_interleaved_attrib_setup(buffer,datatypes,numdata);
01304                     }
01305                     glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES,start*3,(curface-start)*3);
01306                 }
01307             }
01308             GPU_buffer_unbind();
01309         }
01310         GPU_buffer_free(buffer);
01311     }
01312 
01313     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
01314 }
01315 
01316 static void cdDM_drawFacesGLSL(DerivedMesh *dm, DMSetMaterial setMaterial)
01317 {
01318     dm->drawMappedFacesGLSL(dm, setMaterial, NULL, NULL);
01319 }
01320 
01321 static void cdDM_drawMappedFacesMat(DerivedMesh *dm,
01322     void (*setMaterial)(void *userData, int, void *attribs),
01323     int (*setFace)(void *userData, int index), void *userData)
01324 {
01325     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
01326     GPUVertexAttribs gattribs;
01327     DMVertexAttribs attribs;
01328     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
01329     MFace *mf = cddm->mface;
01330     float (*nors)[3] = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_NORMAL);
01331     int a, matnr, new_matnr;
01332     int orig, *index = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01333 
01334     cdDM_update_normals_from_pbvh(dm);
01335 
01336     matnr = -1;
01337 
01338     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
01339 
01340     memset(&attribs, 0, sizeof(attribs));
01341 
01342     glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01343 
01344     for (a = 0; a < dm->numTessFaceData; a++, mf++) {
01345         const int smoothnormal = (mf->flag & ME_SMOOTH);
01346 
01347         /* material */
01348         new_matnr = mf->mat_nr + 1;
01349 
01350         if (new_matnr != matnr) {
01351             glEnd();
01352 
01353             setMaterial(userData, matnr = new_matnr, &gattribs);
01354             DM_vertex_attributes_from_gpu(dm, &gattribs, &attribs);
01355 
01356             glBegin(GL_QUADS);
01357         }
01358 
01359         /* skipping faces */
01360         if (setFace) {
01361             orig = (index)? index[a]: a;
01362 
01363             if (orig != ORIGINDEX_NONE && !setFace(userData, orig))
01364                 continue;
01365         }
01366 
01367         /* smooth normal */
01368         if (!smoothnormal) {
01369             if (nors) {
01370                 glNormal3fv(nors[a]);
01371             }
01372             else {
01373                 /* TODO ideally a normal layer should always be available */
01374                 float nor[3];
01375 
01376                 if (mf->v4)
01377                     normal_quad_v3( nor,mvert[mf->v1].co, mvert[mf->v2].co, mvert[mf->v3].co, mvert[mf->v4].co);
01378                 else
01379                     normal_tri_v3( nor,mvert[mf->v1].co, mvert[mf->v2].co, mvert[mf->v3].co);
01380 
01381                 glNormal3fv(nor);
01382             }
01383         }
01384 
01385         /* vertices */
01386         cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mf->v1, 0, smoothnormal);
01387         cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mf->v2, 1, smoothnormal);
01388         cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mf->v3, 2, smoothnormal);
01389 
01390         if (mf->v4)
01391             cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mf->v4, 3, smoothnormal);
01392         else
01393             cddm_draw_attrib_vertex(&attribs, mvert, a, mf->v3, 2, smoothnormal);
01394     }
01395     glEnd();
01396 
01397     glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
01398 }
01399 
01400 static void cdDM_drawMappedEdges(DerivedMesh *dm, DMSetDrawOptions setDrawOptions, void *userData)
01401 {
01402     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
01403     MVert *vert = cddm->mvert;
01404     MEdge *edge = cddm->medge;
01405     int i, orig, *index = DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01406 
01407     glBegin(GL_LINES);
01408     for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, edge++) {
01409         if (index) {
01410             orig = *index++;
01411             if (setDrawOptions && orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) continue;
01412         }
01413         else
01414             orig = i;
01415 
01416         if (!setDrawOptions || (setDrawOptions(userData, orig) != DM_DRAW_OPTION_SKIP)) {
01417             glVertex3fv(vert[edge->v1].co);
01418             glVertex3fv(vert[edge->v2].co);
01419         }
01420     }
01421     glEnd();
01422 }
01423 
01424 static void cdDM_foreachMappedVert(
01425         DerivedMesh *dm,
01426         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float co[3], const float no_f[3], const short no_s[3]),
01427         void *userData)
01428 {
01429     MVert *mv = CDDM_get_verts(dm);
01430     int i, orig, *index = DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01431 
01432     for (i = 0; i < dm->numVertData; i++, mv++) {
01433         if (index) {
01434             orig = *index++;
01435             if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) continue;
01436             func(userData, orig, mv->co, NULL, mv->no);
01437         }
01438         else
01439             func(userData, i, mv->co, NULL, mv->no);
01440     }
01441 }
01442 
01443 static void cdDM_foreachMappedEdge(
01444         DerivedMesh *dm,
01445         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float v0co[3], const float v1co[3]),
01446         void *userData)
01447 {
01448     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*) dm;
01449     MVert *mv = cddm->mvert;
01450     MEdge *med = cddm->medge;
01451     int i, orig, *index = DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01452 
01453     for (i = 0; i < dm->numEdgeData; i++, med++) {
01454         if (index) {
01455             orig = *index++;
01456             if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) continue;
01457             func(userData, orig, mv[med->v1].co, mv[med->v2].co);
01458         }
01459         else
01460             func(userData, i, mv[med->v1].co, mv[med->v2].co);
01461     }
01462 }
01463 
01464 static void cdDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter(
01465         DerivedMesh *dm,
01466         void (*func)(void *userData, int index, const float cent[3], const float no[3]),
01467         void *userData)
01468 {
01469     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
01470     MVert *mv = cddm->mvert;
01471     MPoly *mp = cddm->mpoly;
01472     MLoop *ml = cddm->mloop;
01473     int i, j, orig, *index;
01474 
01475     index = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01476     mp = cddm->mpoly;
01477     for (i = 0; i < dm->numPolyData; i++, mp++) {
01478         float cent[3];
01479         float no[3];
01480 
01481         if (index) {
01482             orig = *index++;
01483             if (orig == ORIGINDEX_NONE) continue;
01484         }
01485         else
01486             orig = i;
01487         
01488         ml = &cddm->mloop[mp->loopstart];
01489         cent[0] = cent[1] = cent[2] = 0.0f;
01490         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
01491             add_v3_v3v3(cent, cent, mv[ml->v].co);
01492         }
01493         mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f / (float)j);
01494 
01495         ml = &cddm->mloop[mp->loopstart];
01496         if (j > 3) {
01497             normal_quad_v3(no,
01498                            mv[(ml + 0)->v].co,
01499                            mv[(ml + 1)->v].co,
01500                            mv[(ml + 2)->v].co,
01501                            mv[(ml + 3)->v].co);
01502         }
01503         else {
01504             normal_tri_v3(no,
01505                           mv[(ml + 0)->v].co,
01506                           mv[(ml + 1)->v].co,
01507                           mv[(ml + 2)->v].co);
01508         }
01509 
01510         func(userData, orig, cent, no);
01511     }
01512 
01513 }
01514 
01515 void CDDM_recalc_tessellation_ex(DerivedMesh *dm, const int do_face_nor_cpy)
01516 {
01517     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
01518 
01519     dm->numTessFaceData = mesh_recalcTessellation(&dm->faceData, &dm->loopData, &dm->polyData,
01520                                                  cddm->mvert,
01521                                                  dm->numTessFaceData, dm->numLoopData, dm->numPolyData,
01522                                                  do_face_nor_cpy);
01523 
01524     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX)) {
01525         int *polyIndex = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX);
01526         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_REFERENCE, polyIndex, dm->numTessFaceData);
01527     }
01528 
01529     cddm->mface = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE);
01530 
01531     /* Tessellation recreated faceData, and the active layer indices need to get re-propagated
01532      * from loops and polys to faces */
01533     CustomData_bmesh_update_active_layers(&dm->faceData, &dm->polyData, &dm->loopData);
01534 }
01535 
01536 void CDDM_recalc_tessellation(DerivedMesh *dm)
01537 {
01538     CDDM_recalc_tessellation_ex(dm, TRUE);
01539 }
01540 
01541 static void cdDM_free_internal(CDDerivedMesh *cddm)
01542 {
01543     if (cddm->pmap) MEM_freeN(cddm->pmap);
01544     if (cddm->pmap_mem) MEM_freeN(cddm->pmap_mem);
01545 }
01546 
01547 static void cdDM_release(DerivedMesh *dm)
01548 {
01549     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
01550 
01551     if (DM_release(dm)) {
01552         cdDM_free_internal(cddm);
01553         MEM_freeN(cddm);
01554     }
01555 }
01556 
01557 int CDDM_Check(DerivedMesh *dm)
01558 {
01559     return dm && dm->getMinMax == cdDM_getMinMax;
01560 }
01561 
01562 /**************** CDDM interface functions ****************/
01563 static CDDerivedMesh *cdDM_create(const char *desc)
01564 {
01565     CDDerivedMesh *cddm;
01566     DerivedMesh *dm;
01567 
01568     cddm = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*cddm), desc);
01569     dm = &cddm->dm;
01570 
01571     dm->getMinMax = cdDM_getMinMax;
01572 
01573     dm->getNumVerts = cdDM_getNumVerts;
01574     dm->getNumEdges = cdDM_getNumEdges;
01575     dm->getNumTessFaces = cdDM_getNumTessFaces;
01576     dm->getNumLoops = cdDM_getNumLoops;
01577     dm->getNumPolys = cdDM_getNumPolys;
01578 
01579     dm->getVert = cdDM_getVert;
01580     dm->getEdge = cdDM_getEdge;
01581     dm->getTessFace = cdDM_getTessFace;
01582 
01583     dm->copyVertArray = cdDM_copyVertArray;
01584     dm->copyEdgeArray = cdDM_copyEdgeArray;
01585     dm->copyTessFaceArray = cdDM_copyTessFaceArray;
01586     dm->copyLoopArray = cdDM_copyLoopArray;
01587     dm->copyPolyArray = cdDM_copyPolyArray;
01588 
01589     dm->getVertData = DM_get_vert_data;
01590     dm->getEdgeData = DM_get_edge_data;
01591     dm->getTessFaceData = DM_get_tessface_data;
01592     dm->getVertDataArray = DM_get_vert_data_layer;
01593     dm->getEdgeDataArray = DM_get_edge_data_layer;
01594     dm->getTessFaceDataArray = DM_get_tessface_data_layer;
01595 
01596     dm->calcNormals = CDDM_calc_normals_mapping;
01597     dm->recalcTessellation = CDDM_recalc_tessellation;
01598 
01599     dm->getVertCos = cdDM_getVertCos;
01600     dm->getVertCo = cdDM_getVertCo;
01601     dm->getVertNo = cdDM_getVertNo;
01602 
01603     dm->getPBVH = cdDM_getPBVH;
01604     dm->getPolyMap = cdDM_getPolyMap;
01605 
01606     dm->drawVerts = cdDM_drawVerts;
01607 
01608     dm->drawUVEdges = cdDM_drawUVEdges;
01609     dm->drawEdges = cdDM_drawEdges;
01610     dm->drawLooseEdges = cdDM_drawLooseEdges;
01611     dm->drawMappedEdges = cdDM_drawMappedEdges;
01612 
01613     dm->drawFacesSolid = cdDM_drawFacesSolid;
01614     dm->drawFacesTex = cdDM_drawFacesTex;
01615     dm->drawFacesGLSL = cdDM_drawFacesGLSL;
01616     dm->drawMappedFaces = cdDM_drawMappedFaces;
01617     dm->drawMappedFacesTex = cdDM_drawMappedFacesTex;
01618     dm->drawMappedFacesGLSL = cdDM_drawMappedFacesGLSL;
01619     dm->drawMappedFacesMat = cdDM_drawMappedFacesMat;
01620 
01621     dm->foreachMappedVert = cdDM_foreachMappedVert;
01622     dm->foreachMappedEdge = cdDM_foreachMappedEdge;
01623     dm->foreachMappedFaceCenter = cdDM_foreachMappedFaceCenter;
01624 
01625     dm->release = cdDM_release;
01626 
01627     return cddm;
01628 }
01629 
01630 DerivedMesh *CDDM_new(int numVerts, int numEdges, int numTessFaces, int numLoops, int numPolys)
01631 {
01632     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = cdDM_create("CDDM_new dm");
01633     DerivedMesh *dm = &cddm->dm;
01634 
01635     DM_init(dm, DM_TYPE_CDDM, numVerts, numEdges, numTessFaces, numLoops, numPolys);
01636 
01637     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numVerts);
01638     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
01639     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
01640     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
01641     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numPolys);
01642 
01643     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numVerts);
01644     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
01645     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
01646     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numLoops);
01647     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numPolys);
01648 
01649     cddm->mvert = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT);
01650     cddm->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
01651     cddm->mface = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE);
01652     cddm->mloop = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP);
01653     cddm->mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY);
01654 
01655     return dm;
01656 }
01657 
01658 DerivedMesh *CDDM_from_mesh(Mesh *mesh, Object *UNUSED(ob))
01659 {
01660     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = cdDM_create("CDDM_from_mesh dm");
01661     DerivedMesh *dm = &cddm->dm;
01662     CustomDataMask mask = CD_MASK_MESH & (~CD_MASK_MDISPS);
01663     int alloctype;
01664     int *polyindex = NULL;
01665 
01666     /* this does a referenced copy, with an exception for fluidsim */
01667 
01668     DM_init(dm, DM_TYPE_CDDM, mesh->totvert, mesh->totedge, mesh->totface,
01669                 mesh->totloop, mesh->totpoly);
01670 
01671     dm->deformedOnly = 1;
01672 
01673     alloctype= CD_REFERENCE;
01674 
01675     CustomData_merge(&mesh->vdata, &dm->vertData, mask, alloctype,
01676                      mesh->totvert);
01677     CustomData_merge(&mesh->edata, &dm->edgeData, mask, alloctype,
01678                      mesh->totedge);
01679     CustomData_merge(&mesh->fdata, &dm->faceData, mask|CD_MASK_POLYINDEX, alloctype,
01680                      mesh->totface);
01681     CustomData_merge(&mesh->ldata, &dm->loopData, mask, alloctype,
01682                      mesh->totloop);
01683     CustomData_merge(&mesh->pdata, &dm->polyData, mask, alloctype,
01684                      mesh->totpoly);
01685 
01686     cddm->mvert = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT);
01687     cddm->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
01688     cddm->mloop = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP);
01689     cddm->mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY);
01690     cddm->mface = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE);
01691 
01692     /* commented since even when CD_POLYINDEX was first added this line fails
01693      * on the default cube, (after editmode toggle too) - campbell */
01694 #if 0
01695     BLI_assert(CustomData_has_layer(&cddm->dm.faceData, CD_POLYINDEX));
01696 #endif
01697 
01698     polyindex = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX);
01699     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&cddm->dm.faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX)) {
01700         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_REFERENCE, polyindex, mesh->totface);
01701     }
01702 
01703     return dm;
01704 }
01705 
01706 DerivedMesh *CDDM_from_curve(Object *ob)
01707 {
01708     return CDDM_from_curve_customDB(ob, &ob->disp);
01709 }
01710 
01711 DerivedMesh *CDDM_from_curve_customDB(Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase)
01712 {
01713     DerivedMesh *dm;
01714     CDDerivedMesh *cddm;
01715     MVert *allvert;
01716     MEdge *alledge;
01717     MLoop *allloop;
01718     MPoly *allpoly;
01719     int totvert, totedge, totloop, totpoly;
01720 
01721     if (nurbs_to_mdata_customdb(ob, dispbase, &allvert, &totvert, &alledge,
01722         &totedge, &allloop, &allpoly, &totloop, &totpoly) != 0) {
01723         /* Error initializing mdata. This often happens when curve is empty */
01724         return CDDM_new(0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
01725     }
01726 
01727     dm = CDDM_new(totvert, totedge, 0, totloop, totpoly);
01728     dm->deformedOnly = 1;
01729 
01730     cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
01731 
01732     memcpy(cddm->mvert, allvert, totvert*sizeof(MVert));
01733     memcpy(cddm->medge, alledge, totedge*sizeof(MEdge));
01734     memcpy(cddm->mloop, allloop, totloop*sizeof(MLoop));
01735     memcpy(cddm->mpoly, allpoly, totpoly*sizeof(MPoly));
01736 
01737     MEM_freeN(allvert);
01738     MEM_freeN(alledge);
01739     MEM_freeN(allloop);
01740     MEM_freeN(allpoly);
01741 
01742     CDDM_calc_edges(dm);
01743 
01744     return dm;
01745 }
01746 
01747 static void loops_to_customdata_corners(BMesh *bm, CustomData *facedata,
01748                       int cdindex, BMLoop *l3[3],
01749                       int numCol, int numTex)
01750 {
01751     BMLoop *l;
01752     BMFace *f = l3[0]->f;
01753     MTFace *texface;
01754     MTexPoly *texpoly;
01755     MCol *mcol;
01756     MLoopCol *mloopcol;
01757     MLoopUV *mloopuv;
01758     int i, j, hasPCol = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
01759 
01760     for (i=0; i < numTex; i++) {
01761         texface = CustomData_get_n(facedata, CD_MTFACE, cdindex, i);
01762         texpoly = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->pdata, f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY, i);
01763         
01764         ME_MTEXFACE_CPY(texface, texpoly);
01765     
01766         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
01767             l = l3[j];
01768             mloopuv = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV, i);
01769             copy_v2_v2(texface->uv[j], mloopuv->uv);
01770         }
01771     }
01772 
01773     for (i=0; i < numCol; i++) {
01774         mcol = CustomData_get_n(facedata, CD_MCOL, cdindex, i);
01775         
01776         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
01777             l = l3[j];
01778             mloopcol = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL, i);
01779             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
01780         }
01781     }
01782 
01783     if (hasPCol) {
01784         mcol = CustomData_get(facedata, cdindex, CD_PREVIEW_MCOL);
01785 
01786         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
01787             l = l3[j];
01788             mloopcol = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL);
01789             MESH_MLOOPCOL_TO_MCOL(mloopcol, &mcol[j]);
01790         }
01791     }
01792 }
01793 
01794 DerivedMesh *CDDM_from_BMEditMesh(BMEditMesh *em, Mesh *UNUSED(me), int use_mdisps, int use_tessface)
01795 {
01796     BMesh *bm = em->bm;
01797 
01798     DerivedMesh *dm = CDDM_new(bm->totvert,
01799                                bm->totedge,
01800                                use_tessface ? em->tottri : 0,
01801                                bm->totloop,
01802                                bm->totface);
01803 
01804     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
01805     BMIter iter, liter;
01806     BMVert *eve;
01807     BMEdge *eed;
01808     BMFace *efa;
01809     MVert *mvert = cddm->mvert;
01810     MEdge *medge = cddm->medge;
01811     MFace *mface = cddm->mface;
01812     MLoop *mloop = cddm->mloop;
01813     MPoly *mpoly = cddm->mpoly;
01814     int numCol = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->ldata, CD_MLOOPCOL);
01815     int numTex = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->pdata, CD_MTEXPOLY);
01816     int *index, add_orig;
01817     int has_crease, has_edge_bweight, has_vert_bweight;
01818     CustomDataMask mask;
01819     unsigned int i, j;
01820     
01821     has_edge_bweight = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_BWEIGHT);
01822     has_vert_bweight = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->vdata, CD_BWEIGHT);
01823     has_crease = CustomData_has_layer(&bm->edata, CD_CREASE);
01824     
01825     dm->deformedOnly = 1;
01826     
01827     /*don't add origindex layer if one already exists*/
01828     add_orig = !CustomData_has_layer(&bm->pdata, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01829 
01830     mask = use_mdisps ? CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH|CD_MASK_MDISPS : CD_MASK_DERIVEDMESH;
01831     
01832     /* don't process shapekeys, we only feed them through the modifier stack as needed,
01833      * e.g. for applying modifiers or the like*/
01834     mask &= ~CD_MASK_SHAPEKEY;
01835     CustomData_merge(&bm->vdata, &dm->vertData, mask,
01836                      CD_CALLOC, dm->numVertData);
01837     CustomData_merge(&bm->edata, &dm->edgeData, mask,
01838                      CD_CALLOC, dm->numEdgeData);
01839     CustomData_merge(&bm->ldata, &dm->loopData, mask,
01840                      CD_CALLOC, dm->numLoopData);
01841     CustomData_merge(&bm->pdata, &dm->polyData, mask,
01842                      CD_CALLOC, dm->numPolyData);
01843     
01844     /*add tessellation mface layers*/
01845     if (use_tessface) {
01846         CustomData_from_bmeshpoly(&dm->faceData, &dm->polyData, &dm->loopData, em->tottri);
01847     }
01848 
01849     index = dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01850 
01851     eve = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
01852     for (i=0; eve; eve=BM_iter_step(&iter), i++, index++) {
01853         MVert *mv = &mvert[i];
01854 
01855         copy_v3_v3(mv->co, eve->co);
01856 
01857         BM_elem_index_set(eve, i); /* set_inline */
01858 
01859         normal_float_to_short_v3(mv->no, eve->no);
01860 
01861         mv->flag = BM_vert_flag_to_mflag(eve);
01862 
01863         if (has_vert_bweight)
01864             mv->bweight = (unsigned char)(BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->vdata, eve, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01865 
01866         if (add_orig) *index = i;
01867 
01868         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->vdata, &dm->vertData, eve->head.data, i);
01869     }
01870     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_VERT;
01871 
01872     index = dm->getEdgeDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01873     eed = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01874     for (i=0; eed; eed=BM_iter_step(&iter), i++, index++) {
01875         MEdge *med = &medge[i];
01876 
01877         BM_elem_index_set(eed, i); /* set_inline */
01878 
01879         med->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(eed->v1);
01880         med->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(eed->v2);
01881 
01882         if (has_crease)
01883             med->crease = (unsigned char)(BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, eed, CD_CREASE)*255.0f);
01884         if (has_edge_bweight)
01885             med->bweight = (unsigned char)(BM_elem_float_data_get(&bm->edata, eed, CD_BWEIGHT)*255.0f);
01886         
01887         med->flag = BM_edge_flag_to_mflag(eed);
01888 
01889         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->edata, &dm->edgeData, eed->head.data, i);
01890         if (add_orig) *index = i;
01891     }
01892     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
01893 
01894     /* avoid this where possiblem, takes extra memory */
01895     if (use_tessface) {
01896         int *polyindex;
01897 
01898         BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_FACE);
01899 
01900         polyindex = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_POLYINDEX);
01901         index = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01902         for (i = 0; i < dm->numTessFaceData; i++, index++, polyindex++) {
01903             MFace *mf = &mface[i];
01904             BMLoop **l = em->looptris[i];
01905             efa = l[0]->f;
01906 
01907             mf->v1 = BM_elem_index_get(l[0]->v);
01908             mf->v2 = BM_elem_index_get(l[1]->v);
01909             mf->v3 = BM_elem_index_get(l[2]->v);
01910             mf->v4 = 0;
01911             mf->mat_nr = efa->mat_nr;
01912             mf->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(efa);
01913 
01914             *index = add_orig ? BM_elem_index_get(efa) : *(int*)CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, efa->head.data, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01915             *polyindex = BM_elem_index_get(efa);
01916 
01917             loops_to_customdata_corners(bm, &dm->faceData, i, l, numCol, numTex);
01918             test_index_face(mf, &dm->faceData, i, 3);
01919         }
01920     }
01921     
01922     index = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01923     j = 0;
01924     efa = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, NULL);
01925     for (i=0; efa; i++, efa=BM_iter_step(&iter), index++) {
01926         BMLoop *l;
01927         MPoly *mp = &mpoly[i];
01928 
01929         BM_elem_index_set(efa, i); /* set_inline */
01930 
01931         mp->totloop = efa->len;
01932         mp->flag = BM_face_flag_to_mflag(efa);
01933         mp->loopstart = j;
01934         mp->mat_nr = efa->mat_nr;
01935         
01936         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
01937             mloop->v = BM_elem_index_get(l->v);
01938             mloop->e = BM_elem_index_get(l->e);
01939             CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->ldata, &dm->loopData, l->head.data, j);
01940 
01941             j++;
01942             mloop++;
01943         }
01944 
01945         CustomData_from_bmesh_block(&bm->pdata, &dm->polyData, efa->head.data, i);
01946 
01947         if (add_orig) *index = i;
01948     }
01949     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_FACE;
01950 
01951     return dm;
01952 }
01953 
01954 static DerivedMesh *cddm_copy_ex(DerivedMesh *source, int faces_from_tessfaces)
01955 {
01956     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = cdDM_create("CDDM_copy cddm");
01957     DerivedMesh *dm = &cddm->dm;
01958     int numVerts = source->numVertData;
01959     int numEdges = source->numEdgeData;
01960     int numTessFaces = source->numTessFaceData;
01961     int numLoops = source->numLoopData;
01962     int numPolys = source->numPolyData;
01963 
01964     /* ensure these are created if they are made on demand */
01965     source->getVertDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01966     source->getEdgeDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01967     source->getTessFaceDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01968 
01969     /* this initializes dm, and copies all non mvert/medge/mface layers */
01970     DM_from_template(dm, source, DM_TYPE_CDDM, numVerts, numEdges, numTessFaces,
01971         numLoops, numPolys);
01972     dm->deformedOnly = source->deformedOnly;
01973     dm->dirty = source->dirty;
01974 
01975     CustomData_copy_data(&source->vertData, &dm->vertData, 0, 0, numVerts);
01976     CustomData_copy_data(&source->edgeData, &dm->edgeData, 0, 0, numEdges);
01977     CustomData_copy_data(&source->faceData, &dm->faceData, 0, 0, numTessFaces);
01978 
01979     /* now add mvert/medge/mface layers */
01980     cddm->mvert = source->dupVertArray(source);
01981     cddm->medge = source->dupEdgeArray(source);
01982     cddm->mface = source->dupTessFaceArray(source);
01983 
01984     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, CD_ASSIGN, cddm->mvert, numVerts);
01985     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_ASSIGN, cddm->medge, numEdges);
01986     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE, CD_ASSIGN, cddm->mface, numTessFaces);
01987     
01988     if (!faces_from_tessfaces)
01989         DM_DupPolys(source, dm);
01990     else
01991         CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(dm);
01992 
01993     cddm->mloop = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP);
01994     cddm->mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY);
01995 
01996     return dm;
01997 }
01998 
01999 DerivedMesh *CDDM_copy(DerivedMesh *source)
02000 {
02001     return cddm_copy_ex(source, 0);
02002 }
02003 
02004 DerivedMesh *CDDM_copy_from_tessface(DerivedMesh *source)
02005 {
02006     return cddm_copy_ex(source, 1);
02007 }
02008 
02009 /* note, the CD_ORIGINDEX layers are all 0, so if there is a direct
02010  * relationship between mesh data this needs to be set by the caller. */
02011 DerivedMesh *CDDM_from_template(DerivedMesh *source,
02012                                 int numVerts, int numEdges, int numTessFaces,
02013                                 int numLoops, int numPolys)
02014 {
02015     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = cdDM_create("CDDM_from_template dest");
02016     DerivedMesh *dm = &cddm->dm;
02017 
02018     /* ensure these are created if they are made on demand */
02019     source->getVertDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02020     source->getEdgeDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02021     source->getTessFaceDataArray(source, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02022 
02023     /* this does a copy of all non mvert/medge/mface layers */
02024     DM_from_template(dm, source, DM_TYPE_CDDM, numVerts, numEdges, numTessFaces, numLoops, numPolys);
02025 
02026     /* now add mvert/medge/mface layers */
02027     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numVerts);
02028     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
02029     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
02030     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numLoops);
02031     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numPolys);
02032 
02033     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_ORIGINDEX))
02034         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numVerts);
02035     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX))
02036         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
