02037     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX))
02038         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
02039     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX))
02040         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numTessFaces);
02041 
02042     cddm->mvert = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT);
02043     cddm->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
02044     cddm->mface = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE);
02045     cddm->mloop = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP);
02046     cddm->mpoly = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY);
02047 
02048     return dm;
02049 }
02050 
02051 void CDDM_apply_vert_coords(DerivedMesh *dm, float (*vertCoords)[3])
02052 {
02053     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02054     MVert *vert;
02055     int i;
02056 
02057     /* this will just return the pointer if it wasn't a referenced layer */
02058     vert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, dm->numVertData);
02059     cddm->mvert = vert;
02060 
02061     for (i = 0; i < dm->numVertData; ++i, ++vert)
02062         copy_v3_v3(vert->co, vertCoords[i]);
02063 }
02064 
02065 void CDDM_apply_vert_normals(DerivedMesh *dm, short (*vertNormals)[3])
02066 {
02067     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02068     MVert *vert;
02069     int i;
02070 
02071     /* this will just return the pointer if it wasn't a referenced layer */
02072     vert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, dm->numVertData);
02073     cddm->mvert = vert;
02074 
02075     for (i = 0; i < dm->numVertData; ++i, ++vert)
02076         copy_v3_v3_short(vert->no, vertNormals[i]);
02077 }
02078 
02079 void CDDM_calc_normals_mapping_ex(DerivedMesh *dm, const short only_face_normals)
02080 {
02081     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02082     float (*face_nors)[3] = NULL;
02083 
02084     if (dm->numVertData == 0) return;
02085 
02086     /* now we skip calculating vertex normals for referenced layer,
02087      * no need to duplicate verts.
02088      * WATCH THIS, bmesh only change!,
02089      * need to take care of the side effects here - campbell */
02090     #if 0
02091     /* we don't want to overwrite any referenced layers */
02092     cddm->mvert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, dm->numVertData);
02093     #endif
02094 
02095 
02096     if (dm->numTessFaceData == 0) {
02097         /* No tessellation on this mesh yet, need to calculate one.
02098          *
02099          * Important not to update face normals from polys since it
02100          * interfears with assigning the new normal layer in the following code.
02101          */
02102         CDDM_recalc_tessellation_ex(dm, FALSE);
02103     }
02104     else {
02105         /* A tessellation already exists, it should always have a CD_POLYINDEX */
02106         BLI_assert(CustomData_has_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX));
02107         CustomData_free_layers(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL, dm->numTessFaceData);
02108     }
02109 
02110 
02111     face_nors = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*3*dm->numTessFaceData, "face_nors");
02112 
02113     /* calculate face normals */
02114     mesh_calc_normals_mapping_ex(cddm->mvert, dm->numVertData, CDDM_get_loops(dm), CDDM_get_polys(dm),
02115                                  dm->numLoopData, dm->numPolyData, NULL, cddm->mface, dm->numTessFaceData,
02116                                  CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_POLYINDEX), face_nors,
02117                                  only_face_normals);
02118 
02119     CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL, CD_ASSIGN,
02120                          face_nors, dm->numTessFaceData);
02121 }
02122 
02123 
02124 void CDDM_calc_normals_mapping(DerivedMesh *dm)
02125 {
02126     /* use this to skip calculating normals on original vert's, this may need to be changed */
02127     const short only_face_normals = CustomData_is_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT);
02128 
02129     CDDM_calc_normals_mapping_ex(dm, only_face_normals);
02130 }
02131 
02132 /* bmesh note: this matches what we have in trunk */
02133 void CDDM_calc_normals(DerivedMesh *dm)
02134 {
02135     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02136     float (*poly_nors)[3];
02137 
02138     if (dm->numVertData == 0) return;
02139 
02140     /* we don't want to overwrite any referenced layers */
02141     cddm->mvert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, dm->numVertData);
02142 
02143     /* fill in if it exists */
02144     poly_nors = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL);
02145     if (!poly_nors) {
02146         poly_nors = CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dm->numPolyData);
02147     }
02148 
02149     mesh_calc_normals(cddm->mvert, dm->numVertData, CDDM_get_loops(dm), CDDM_get_polys(dm),
02150                       dm->numLoopData, dm->numPolyData, poly_nors);
02151 }
02152 
02153 void CDDM_calc_normals_tessface(DerivedMesh *dm)
02154 {
02155     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02156     float (*face_nors)[3];
02157 
02158     if (dm->numVertData == 0) return;
02159 
02160     /* we don't want to overwrite any referenced layers */
02161     cddm->mvert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, dm->numVertData);
02162 
02163     /* fill in if it exists */
02164     face_nors = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL);
02165     if (!face_nors) {
02166         face_nors = CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_NORMAL, CD_CALLOC, NULL, dm->numTessFaceData);
02167     }
02168 
02169     mesh_calc_normals_tessface(cddm->mvert, dm->numVertData,
02170                                cddm->mface, dm->numTessFaceData, face_nors);
02171 }
02172 
02173 #if 1
02174 /* merge verts
02175  *
02176  * vtargetmap is a table that maps vertices to target vertices.  a value of -1
02177  * indicates a vertex is a target, and is to be kept.
02178  *
02179  * this frees dm, and returns a new one.
02180  *
02181  * this is a really horribly written function.  ger. - joeedh
02182  *
02183  * note, CDDM_recalc_tessellation has to run on the returned DM if you want to access tessfaces.
02184  */
02185 DerivedMesh *CDDM_merge_verts(DerivedMesh *dm, const int *vtargetmap)
02186 {
02187     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02188     CDDerivedMesh *cddm2 = NULL;
02189     MVert *mv, *mvert = NULL;
02190     BLI_array_declare(mvert);
02191     MEdge *med, *medge = NULL;
02192     BLI_array_declare(medge);
02193     MPoly *mp, *mpoly = NULL;
02194     BLI_array_declare(mpoly);
02195     MLoop *ml, *mloop = NULL;
02196     BLI_array_declare(mloop);
02197     EdgeHash *ehash = BLI_edgehash_new();
02198     int *newv = NULL, *newe = NULL, *newl = NULL;
02199     int *oldv = NULL, *olde = NULL, *oldl = NULL, *oldp = NULL;
02200     BLI_array_declare(oldv); BLI_array_declare(olde); BLI_array_declare(oldl); BLI_array_declare(oldp);
02201     int i, j, c, totloop, totpoly;
02202     
02203     totloop = dm->numLoopData;
02204     totpoly = dm->numPolyData;
02205     
02206     newv = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*dm->numVertData, "newv vtable CDDM_merge_verts");
02207     newe = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*dm->numEdgeData, "newv etable CDDM_merge_verts");
02208     newl = MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totloop, "newv ltable CDDM_merge_verts");
02209     
02210     /*fill newl with destination vertex indices*/
02211     mv = cddm->mvert;
02212     c = 0;
02213     for (i=0; i<dm->numVertData; i++, mv++) {
02214         if (vtargetmap[i] == -1) {
02215             BLI_array_append(oldv, i);
02216             newv[i] = c++;
02217             BLI_array_append(mvert, *mv);
02218         }
02219     }
02220     
02221     /*now link target vertices to destination indices*/
02222     for (i=0; i<dm->numVertData; i++) {
02223         if (vtargetmap[i] != -1) {
02224             newv[i] = newv[vtargetmap[i]];
02225         }
02226     }
02227     
02228     /*find-replace merged vertices with target vertices*/   
02229     ml = cddm->mloop;
02230     for (i=0; i<totloop; i++, ml++) {
02231         if (vtargetmap[ml->v] != -1) {
02232             ml->v = vtargetmap[ml->v];
02233         }
02234     }
02235 
02236     /*now go through and fix edges and faces*/
02237     med = cddm->medge;
02238     c = 0;
02239     for (i=0; i<dm->numEdgeData; i++, med++) {
02240         
02241         if (LIKELY(med->v1 != med->v2)) {
02242             const unsigned int v1 = (vtargetmap[med->v1] != -1) ? vtargetmap[med->v1] : med->v1;
02243             const unsigned int v2 = (vtargetmap[med->v2] != -1) ? vtargetmap[med->v2] : med->v2;
02244             void **eh_p= BLI_edgehash_lookup_p(ehash, v1, v2);
02245 
02246             if (eh_p) {
02247                 newe[i] = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(*eh_p);
02248             }
02249             else {
02250                 BLI_array_append(olde, i);
02251                 newe[i] = c;
02252                 BLI_array_append(medge, *med);
02253                 BLI_edgehash_insert(ehash, v1, v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(c));
02254                 c++;
02255             }
02256         }
02257         else {
02258             newe[i] = -1;
02259         }
02260     }
02261     
02262     mp = cddm->mpoly;
02263     for (i=0; i<totpoly; i++, mp++) {
02264         MPoly *mp2;
02265         
02266         ml = cddm->mloop + mp->loopstart;
02267 
02268         c = 0;
02269         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
02270             med = cddm->medge + ml->e;
02271             if (LIKELY(med->v1 != med->v2)) {
02272                 newl[j+mp->loopstart] = BLI_array_count(mloop);
02273                 BLI_array_append(oldl, j+mp->loopstart);
02274                 BLI_array_append(mloop, *ml);
02275                 c++;
02276             }
02277         }
02278 
02279         if (UNLIKELY(c == 0)) {
02280             continue;
02281         }
02282         
02283         mp2 = BLI_array_append_r(mpoly, *mp);
02284         mp2->totloop = c;
02285         mp2->loopstart = BLI_array_count(mloop) - c;
02286         
02287         BLI_array_append(oldp, i);
02288     }
02289     
02290     /*create new cddm*/ 
02291     cddm2 = (CDDerivedMesh*) CDDM_from_template((DerivedMesh*)cddm, BLI_array_count(mvert), BLI_array_count(medge), 0, BLI_array_count(mloop), BLI_array_count(mpoly));
02292     
02293     /*update edge indices and copy customdata*/
02294     med = medge;
02295     for (i=0; i<cddm2->dm.numEdgeData; i++, med++) {
02296         if (newv[med->v1] != -1)
02297             med->v1 = newv[med->v1];
02298         if (newv[med->v2] != -1)
02299             med->v2 = newv[med->v2];
02300         
02301         CustomData_copy_data(&dm->edgeData, &cddm2->dm.edgeData, olde[i], i, 1);
02302     }
02303     
02304     /*update loop indices and copy customdata*/
02305     ml = mloop;
02306     for (i=0; i<cddm2->dm.numLoopData; i++, ml++) {
02307         if (newe[ml->e] != -1)
02308             ml->e = newe[ml->e];
02309         if (newv[ml->v] != -1)
02310             ml->v = newv[ml->v];
02311             
02312         CustomData_copy_data(&dm->loopData, &cddm2->dm.loopData, oldl[i], i, 1);
02313     }
02314     
02315     /*copy vertex customdata*/  
02316     mv = mvert;
02317     for (i=0; i<cddm2->dm.numVertData; i++, mv++) {
02318         CustomData_copy_data(&dm->vertData, &cddm2->dm.vertData, oldv[i], i, 1);
02319     }
02320     
02321     /*copy poly customdata*/
02322     mp = mpoly;
02323     for (i=0; i<cddm2->dm.numPolyData; i++, mp++) {
02324         CustomData_copy_data(&dm->polyData, &cddm2->dm.polyData, oldp[i], i, 1);
02325     }
02326     
02327     /*copy over data.  CustomData_add_layer can do this, need to look it up.*/
02328     memcpy(cddm2->mvert, mvert, sizeof(MVert)*BLI_array_count(mvert));
02329     memcpy(cddm2->medge, medge, sizeof(MEdge)*BLI_array_count(medge));
02330     memcpy(cddm2->mloop, mloop, sizeof(MLoop)*BLI_array_count(mloop));
02331     memcpy(cddm2->mpoly, mpoly, sizeof(MPoly)*BLI_array_count(mpoly));
02332     BLI_array_free(mvert); BLI_array_free(medge); BLI_array_free(mloop); BLI_array_free(mpoly);
02333     
02334     if (newv) 
02335         MEM_freeN(newv); 
02336     if (newe)
02337         MEM_freeN(newe); 
02338     if (newl)
02339         MEM_freeN(newl);
02340     if (oldv) 
02341         MEM_freeN(oldv); 
02342     if (olde) 
02343         MEM_freeN(olde); 
02344     if (oldl) 
02345         MEM_freeN(oldl); 
02346     if (oldp) 
02347         MEM_freeN(oldp);
02348     if (ehash)
02349         BLI_edgehash_free(ehash, NULL);
02350 
02351     /*free old derivedmesh*/
02352     dm->needsFree = 1;
02353     dm->release(dm);
02354     
02355     return (DerivedMesh*)cddm2;
02356 }
02357 #endif
02358 
02359 void CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(DerivedMesh *dm)
02360 {
02361     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02362     CustomData edgeData;
02363     EdgeHashIterator *ehi;
02364     MFace *mf = cddm->mface;
02365     MEdge *med;
02366     EdgeHash *eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
02367     int i, *index, numEdges, maxFaces = dm->numTessFaceData;
02368 
02369     for (i = 0; i < maxFaces; i++, mf++) {
02370         if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2))
02371             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2, NULL);
02372         if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v2, mf->v3))
02373             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v2, mf->v3, NULL);
02374         
02375         if (mf->v4) {
02376             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v3, mf->v4))
02377                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v3, mf->v4, NULL);
02378             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v4, mf->v1))
02379                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v4, mf->v1, NULL);
02380         }
02381         else {
02382             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, mf->v3, mf->v1))
02383                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, mf->v3, mf->v1, NULL);
02384         }
02385     }
02386 
02387     numEdges = BLI_edgehash_size(eh);
02388 
02389     /* write new edges into a temporary CustomData */
02390     memset(&edgeData, 0, sizeof(edgeData));
02391     CustomData_add_layer(&edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
02392     CustomData_add_layer(&edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
02393 
02394     ehi = BLI_edgehashIterator_new(eh);
02395     med = CustomData_get_layer(&edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
02396     index = CustomData_get_layer(&edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02397     for (i = 0; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi);
02398         BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi), ++i, ++med, ++index) {
02399         BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(ehi, &med->v1, &med->v2);
02400 
02401         med->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER;
02402         *index = ORIGINDEX_NONE;
02403     }
02404     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
02405 
02406     /* free old CustomData and assign new one */
02407     CustomData_free(&dm->edgeData, dm->numEdgeData);
02408     dm->edgeData = edgeData;
02409     dm->numEdgeData = numEdges;
02410 
02411     cddm->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
02412 
02413     BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
02414 }
02415 
02416 /* warning, this uses existing edges but CDDM_calc_edges_tessface() doesn't */
02417 void CDDM_calc_edges(DerivedMesh *dm)
02418 {
02419     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02420     CustomData edgeData;
02421     EdgeHashIterator *ehi;
02422     MPoly *mp = cddm->mpoly;
02423     MLoop *ml;
02424     MEdge *med;
02425     EdgeHash *eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
02426     int v1, v2;
02427     int *eindex;
02428     int i, j, *index, numEdges = cddm->dm.numEdgeData, maxFaces = dm->numPolyData;
02429 
02430     eindex = DM_get_edge_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02431 
02432     med = cddm->medge;
02433     if (med) {
02434         for (i=0; i < numEdges; i++, med++) {
02435             BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, med->v1, med->v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i+1));
02436         }
02437     }
02438 
02439     for (i=0; i < maxFaces; i++, mp++) {
02440         ml = cddm->mloop + mp->loopstart;
02441         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
02442             v1 = ml->v;
02443             v2 = ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(cddm->mloop, mp, j)->v;
02444             if (!BLI_edgehash_haskey(eh, v1, v2)) {
02445                 BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, v1, v2, NULL);
02446             }
02447         }
02448     }
02449 
02450     numEdges = BLI_edgehash_size(eh);
02451 
02452     /* write new edges into a temporary CustomData */
02453     memset(&edgeData, 0, sizeof(edgeData));
02454     CustomData_add_layer(&edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
02455     CustomData_add_layer(&edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX, CD_CALLOC, NULL, numEdges);
02456 
02457     ehi = BLI_edgehashIterator_new(eh);
02458     med = CustomData_get_layer(&edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
02459     index = CustomData_get_layer(&edgeData, CD_ORIGINDEX);
02460     for (i = 0; !BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(ehi);
02461         BLI_edgehashIterator_step(ehi), ++i, ++med, ++index) {
02462         BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(ehi, &med->v1, &med->v2);
02463         j = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(ehi));
02464 
02465         med->flag = ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER;
02466         *index = j==0 ? ORIGINDEX_NONE : eindex[j-1];
02467 
02468         BLI_edgehashIterator_setValue(ehi, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
02469     }
02470     BLI_edgehashIterator_free(ehi);
02471 
02472     /* free old CustomData and assign new one */
02473     CustomData_free(&dm->edgeData, dm->numEdgeData);
02474     dm->edgeData = edgeData;
02475     dm->numEdgeData = numEdges;
02476 
02477     cddm->medge = CustomData_get_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE);
02478 
02479     mp = cddm->mpoly;
02480     for (i=0; i < maxFaces; i++, mp++) {
02481         ml = cddm->mloop + mp->loopstart;
02482         for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
02483             v1 = ml->v;
02484             v2 = ME_POLY_LOOP_NEXT(cddm->mloop, mp, j)->v;
02485             ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, v1, v2));
02486         }
02487     }
02488 
02489     BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
02490 }
02491 
02492 void CDDM_lower_num_verts(DerivedMesh *dm, int numVerts)
02493 {
02494     if (numVerts < dm->numVertData)
02495         CustomData_free_elem(&dm->vertData, numVerts, dm->numVertData-numVerts);
02496 
02497     dm->numVertData = numVerts;
02498 }
02499 
02500 void CDDM_lower_num_edges(DerivedMesh *dm, int numEdges)
02501 {
02502     if (numEdges < dm->numEdgeData)
02503         CustomData_free_elem(&dm->edgeData, numEdges, dm->numEdgeData-numEdges);
02504 
02505     dm->numEdgeData = numEdges;
02506 }
02507 
02508 void CDDM_lower_num_tessfaces(DerivedMesh *dm, int numTessFaces)
02509 {
02510     if (numTessFaces < dm->numTessFaceData)
02511         CustomData_free_elem(&dm->faceData, numTessFaces, dm->numTessFaceData-numTessFaces);
02512 
02513     dm->numTessFaceData = numTessFaces;
02514 }
02515 
02516 void CDDM_lower_num_polys(DerivedMesh *dm, int numPolys)
02517 {
02518     if (numPolys < dm->numPolyData)
02519         CustomData_free_elem(&dm->polyData, numPolys, dm->numPolyData-numPolys);
02520 
02521     dm->numPolyData = numPolys;
02522 }

02559 {
02560     return ((CDDerivedMesh*)dm)->medge;
02561 }

02566 }

02569 {

02574 {

02577 
02578 void CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces(DerivedMesh *dm)
02579 {
02580     /*converts mfaces to mpolys/mloops*/
02581     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02582     MFace *mf;
02583     MEdge *me;
02584     EdgeHash *eh = BLI_edgehash_new();
02585     int i, totloop;
02586 
02587     /* ... on second thaughts, better comment this and assume caller knows edge state. */
02588 #if 0
02589     /* ensure we have all the edges we need */
02590     CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(dm);
02591 #else
02592 #  ifndef NDEBUG
02593     {
02594         /* ensure we have correct edges on non release builds */
02595         i = cddm->dm.numEdgeData;
02596         CDDM_calc_edges_tessface(dm);
02597         BLI_assert(cddm->dm.numEdgeData == i);
02598     }
02599 #  endif
02600 #endif
02601 
02602     /*build edge hash*/
02603     me = cddm->medge;
02604     for (i=0; i<cddm->dm.numEdgeData; i++, me++) {
02605         BLI_edgehash_insert(eh, me->v1, me->v2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
02606     }
02607 
02608     mf = cddm->mface;
02609     totloop = 0;
02610     for (i=0; i<cddm->dm.numTessFaceData; i++, mf++) {
02611         totloop += mf->v4 ? 4 : 3;
02612     }
02613 
02614     CustomData_free(&cddm->dm.polyData, cddm->dm.numPolyData);
02615     CustomData_free(&cddm->dm.loopData, cddm->dm.numLoopData);
02616     
02617     cddm->dm.numLoopData = totloop;
02618     cddm->dm.numPolyData = cddm->dm.numTessFaceData;
02619 
02620     if (totloop) {
02621         MLoop *ml;
02622         MPoly *mp;
02623         int l, *polyindex;
02624 
02625         cddm->mloop = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MLoop)*totloop, "cddm->mloop in CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces");
02626         cddm->mpoly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(MPoly)*cddm->dm.numTessFaceData, "cddm->mpoly in CDDM_tessfaces_to_faces");
02627 
02628         CustomData_add_layer(&cddm->dm.loopData, CD_MLOOP, CD_ASSIGN, cddm->mloop, totloop);
02629         CustomData_add_layer(&cddm->dm.polyData, CD_MPOLY, CD_ASSIGN, cddm->mpoly, cddm->dm.numPolyData);
02630         CustomData_merge(&cddm->dm.faceData, &cddm->dm.polyData,
02631             CD_MASK_ORIGINDEX, CD_DUPLICATE, cddm->dm.numTessFaceData);
02632 
02633         polyindex = CustomData_get_layer(&cddm->dm.faceData, CD_POLYINDEX);
02634 
02635         mf = cddm->mface;
02636         mp = cddm->mpoly;
02637         ml = cddm->mloop;
02638         l = 0;
02639         for (i=0; i<cddm->dm.numTessFaceData; i++, mf++, mp++, polyindex++) {
02640             mp->flag = mf->flag;
02641             mp->loopstart = l;
02642             mp->mat_nr = mf->mat_nr;
02643             mp->totloop = mf->v4 ? 4 : 3;
02644 
02645             ml->v = mf->v1;
02646             ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, mf->v1, mf->v2));
02647             ml++, l++;
02648 
02649             ml->v = mf->v2;
02650             ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, mf->v2, mf->v3));
02651             ml++, l++;
02652 
02653             ml->v = mf->v3;
02654             ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, mf->v3, mf->v4?mf->v4:mf->v1));
02655             ml++, l++;
02656 
02657             if (mf->v4) {
02658                 ml->v = mf->v4;
02659                 ml->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_edgehash_lookup(eh, mf->v4, mf->v1));
02660                 ml++, l++;
02661             }
02662 
02663             *polyindex = i;
02664         }
02665     }
02666 
02667     BLI_edgehash_free(eh, NULL);
02668 }
02669 
02670 void CDDM_set_mvert(DerivedMesh *dm, MVert *mvert)
02671 {
02672     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02673     
02674     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT))
02675         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MVERT, CD_ASSIGN, mvert, dm->numVertData);
02676                 
02677     cddm->mvert = mvert;
02678 }
02679 
02680 void CDDM_set_medge(DerivedMesh *dm, MEdge *medge)
02681 {
02682     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02683 
02684     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE))
02685         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->edgeData, CD_MEDGE, CD_ASSIGN, medge, dm->numEdgeData);
02686 
02687     cddm->medge = medge;
02688 }
02689 
02690 void CDDM_set_mface(DerivedMesh *dm, MFace *mface)
02691 {
02692     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02693 
02694     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE))
02695         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MFACE, CD_ASSIGN, mface, dm->numTessFaceData);
02696 
02697     cddm->mface = mface;
02698 }
02699 
02700 void CDDM_set_mloop(DerivedMesh *dm, MLoop *mloop)
02701 {
02702     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02703 
02704     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP))
02705         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->loopData, CD_MLOOP, CD_ASSIGN, mloop, dm->numLoopData);
02706 
02707     cddm->mloop = mloop;
02708 }
02709 
02710 void CDDM_set_mpoly(DerivedMesh *dm, MPoly *mpoly)
02711 {
02712     CDDerivedMesh *cddm = (CDDerivedMesh*)dm;
02713 
02714     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY))
02715         CustomData_add_layer(&dm->polyData, CD_MPOLY, CD_ASSIGN, mpoly, dm->numPolyData);
02716 
02717     cddm->mpoly = mpoly;
02718 }
